I just talked to Panzertron (the person). Now he wants Panzertron (the bot) 
to be simply left in the IF.

::Zardus/The Oblitercons/DevilDuer/Reptilica/Bloodystrike::

Zardus growls as Deemos crawls off (that was pretty cheap, Soulstice, I 
didn't get a chance to respond). "Kill him," he says into his comm-link, 
sending it to all Alliance members.

The Oblitercons nod, Dark one flying up.

"Oblitercons, unite!" he orders, the other four jumping up and transforming 
into various body parts. In several seconds, Oblitertron roars, running after 
Surge, firing his giant laser gun, along with his optic lasers at the 
Maximal. He slowly gains on Surge, continuing to fire.

Behind him, Zardus, Reptilica, and Bloodystrike follow behind, also firing 
their weapons at Deemos and group, their jetpacks blazing on full power in 
order to keep up with the giant bot.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DevilDuer looks around him, at the Alliance bots still there. "I think we 
should get back to base," he says, "Anyone need a CR chamber?"
